TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MembershipPasswordAttribute extends System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationAttribute

Docs.summary: Validates whether a password field meets the current password requirements for the membership provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string FormatErrorMessage(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name to include in the formatted message.
Docs.summary: Applies formatting to an error message based on the provided of the data field where the error occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationResult IsValid(object value, class System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationContext validationContext) cil managed

Docs.param: The context information about the validation operation.
Docs.summary: Validates the specified value with respect to the current validation attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError property contains either the literal, non-localized string or the resource key that you can use with the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.ResourceType%2A> property to configure the localized error message. The error message is displayed when the provided password contains fewer non-alphanumeric characters than specified by the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> property.

## Remarks The MinPasswordLengthError property contains either a literal, non-localized string or a resource key that you can use with the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.ResourceType%2A> property to configure the localized error message. The error message is displayed when the provided password is shorter than the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> property.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the minimum required non-alpha numeric characters the attribute uses for validation.
Docs.value: The minimum required non-alpha numeric characters the attribute uses for validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters property is not explicitly set, it uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> property.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the minimum required password length this attribute uses for validation.
Docs.value: The minimum required password length this attribute uses for validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the MinRequiredPasswordLength property is not explicitly set, it uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> property.

## Remarks The PasswordStrengthError property contains either the literal, non-localized string or the resource key that you can use with a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.ResourceType%2A> property to configure the localized error message. The error message is displayed when the provided password is shorter than the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> property.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies how long the regular expression can occur before the operation times out.
Docs.value: A value that specifies how long the regular expression can occur before the operation times out.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the regular expression string representing the password strength the attribute uses for validation.
Docs.value: The regular expression string representing the password strength the attribute uses for validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the PasswordStrengthRegularExpression property is not explicitly set, it uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> property.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Type> that contains the resources for the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.MinPasswordLengthError%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.MinNonAlphanumericCharactersError%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordAttribute.PasswordStrengthError%2A> property.
